sections.name: Human Endeavors
content: The following set of human endeavors, accompanies by their costs and benefits, are part of what we term Comparative Progress Studies.
The full set of endeavors is as follows.

references.author: Bentzen, J., Truc, N. T. T., Nam, T. S.
references.title: A Social Cost-Benefit Analysis of Biogas Technologies using Rice Straw and Water Hyacinths as Feedstock
